allow: Bash(echo "Aguardando deploy do Railway..." sleep 30 echo "" echo "Testando endpoint de login..." curl -X POST "https://backend-production-01bf8.up.railway.app/auth/login" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""username"":""bruno"",""password"":""123456""}" -i)

Bash(timeout 90 bash -c '
echo ""Aguardando deploy do Railway (60 segundos)...""
sleep 60
echo """"
echo ""Testando endpoint de login...""
curl -X POST ""https://backend-production-01bf8.up.railway.app/auth/login"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{\""username\"":\""bruno\"",\""password\"":\""123456\""}"" \
  -w ""\n\nStatus Code: %{http_code}\n"" \
  2>&1 | grep -v ""^%"" | head -n 40
')
